roleset.name: make better
roleset.note: IMPROVE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'improve' based on survey of initial sentences of big corpus. (from improve.01-v predicate notes)
IMPROVEMENT-N NOTES: Updated by Julia. Member of Vncls Other_cos-45.4. (from improvement.01-n)
IMPROVED-J NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to improve.01. Improve.01 is a member of VN class other_cos-45.4. Framed by Katie. (from improved.01-j)

roles.note: This frame combines the senses of improve.01 and improve.02-- that frameset mentions example sentences that are a blend between the two, and it would be too difficult to separate them here. They can all take the same syntax anyway. (from improvement.01-n)

example.name: agentive
example.text: ...if they don't improve their protection of intellectual property by next spring.

example.name: how?
example.text: Taiwan has improved its standing with the US by initialing a bilateral copyright agreement.
example.arg: by initialing a bilateral copyright agreement.

example.name: ergative
example.text: Business conditions will improve in the coming six months.

example.name: unstated thing improving
example.text: Dow will improve on its year-ago fourth-quarter net of $3.44 a share.
example.arg: on its year-ago fourth-quarter net of $3.44 a share

example.name: autogen1
example.text: some shipping-rate improvements in both theintergrated-steel and steel-service-center segments
example.arg: in both the intergrated-steel and steel-service-center segments

example.name: autogen2
example.text: an improvement in our U.S. business

example.name: lots of args
example.text: a dramatic improvement in intelligence gathering human intelligence infiltrating these cells over the past few years on the part of the United States
example.arg: in intelligence gathering human intelligence infiltrating these cells
on the part of the United States

example.name: dir for starting point
example.text: a small improvement from the 5.8 million rate of early October
example.arg: from the 5.8 million rate of early October

example.name: numeric extent
example.text: a one percentage point improvement in productivity growth

example.name: with arg m-TMP
example.text: Right dorsalis pedis pulse was much improved from preoperative physical exam

roleset.name: add, rise
roleset.note: IMPROVE-V NOTES: There's also a nice example of the two senses merging: "Ekco [is] toimprove on-time delivery of orders to about 95% from around 70%." (from improve.02-v)

example.name: should have seen this coming
example.text: National Market System volume improved to 94,425,00 shares from 71.7 million Monday.
